scene_description_enriched: A crowned figure, likely King David, is depicted seated within an architectural setting, possibly a tower or chamber. He wears a royal blue robe lined with ermine and a golden crown. In his hands, he holds two hammers, poised to strike. Before him rests a large, ornate object, possibly a musical instrument or a bell, with several bells hanging above it. The background features a starry blue sky and architectural elements suggesting a fortified structure. The scene is framed by an arched border adorned with floral motifs.
